name: Beef Bhuna
description: A traditional Bangladeshi dish made with beef cubes cooked in a spicy mixture of onions, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, and yogurt, seasoned with various aromatic spices.

name: Beef Tehari
description: A flavorful rice dish made with beef cubes, basmati rice, and a blend of spices, cooked together to create a rich and aromatic meal, perfect for special occasions.

name: Beef Curry
description: A hearty curry made with tender beef cubes simmered in a spiced tomato and onion gravy, often with potatoes, served hot with rice or roti.

name: Kala Bhuna
description: A dark, rich beef dish where the meat is slow-cooked with caramelized onions and a blend of spices, resulting in a deeply flavored and aromatic curry.
